item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260125.1)
item.description:
What's New

feat: Add Translation feature with multiple providers

Translation Feature:

  • Add Translation hotkey to translate selected text instantly
  • Support 30+ languages with auto-detect source language
  • 3 translation providers: Google Translate, Tencent Transmart, Volcano Engine
  • Auto fallback when a provider fails
  • Preserve text case (ALL CAPS, Capitalize, lowercase)
  • Loading overlay with status indicator
  • Smart text retrieval via Accessibility API with Clipboard fallback

UI Improvements:

  • Add Translation settings section
  • Add GitHub and Bug Report icons to About section
  • Optimize state management and focus detection

Documentation:

  • Update README with Translation feature documentation
  • Update version to 1.2.20
  • Update project structure with Translation directory
